text: Leila Marie Koerber (or Marie Dressler; November 9, 1868 - July 28, 1934) was a Canadian and American actress. She was born in Ontario. She acted in movies and on stage. Her movies include Tillie's Punctured Romance (1914), Min and Bill (1930). She won an Academy Award for Best Actress for Min and Bill. Dressler died of cancer at age 65. title: Marie Dressler
